title: Cardio Blast
description: Ignite your cardiovascular health and incinerate calories with our high-intensity Cardio Blast. Join us for a heart-pumping experience that improves endurance, stamina, and overall cardiovascular fitness. Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays from 7:00 AM to 8:00 AM. Fuel up with a Protein shake and a Banana.
topic_description: Improve endurance, stamina, and overall cardiovascular fitness.

title: Strength Training
description: Build and sculpt your muscles with Strength Training. This class focuses on resistance exercises to enhance muscle strength, definition, and functional fitness. Join us on Tuesdays and Thursdays from 6:30 PM to 7:15 PM. Refuel with Chicken breast and Quinoa.
topic_description: Enhance muscle strength, definition, and functional fitness.

title: Yoga Flow
description: Find serenity and vitality in our Yoga Flow class. Immerse yourself in a blend of breath and movement to promote flexibility, balance, and stress relief. Saturdays and Sundays from 9:00 AM to 10:15 AM. Replenish with a Green smoothie and Mixed nuts.
topic_description: Promote flexibility, balance, and stress relief through yoga poses.

title: HIIT Express
description: Maximize calorie burn in minimal time with HIIT Express. Quick and intense high-intensity interval training on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays from 5:30 PM to 6:00 PM. Energize with an Energy bar and an Orange.
topic_description: Boost metabolism, burn fat, and improve cardiovascular health.

title: Pilates Core
description: Strengthen your core and enhance overall body awareness with Pilates Core. Tuesdays and Thursdays from 9:30 AM to 10:20 AM. Nourish with Greek yogurt and Berries.
topic_description: Focus on core strength, stability, and overall body awareness.

title: Zumba Party
description: Dance, move, and have a blast in our Zumba Party! Saturdays from 11:00 AM to 12:00 PM. Burn calories, improve cardiovascular health, and enjoy the rhythm. Stay hydrated with Water and indulge in Fruit slices.
topic_description: Have fun while burning calories and improving cardiovascular health.

title: Mindful Meditation
description: Unwind and find inner peace in our Mindful Meditation class. Sundays from 5:30 PM to 6:00 PM. Reduce stress, improve focus, and cultivate serenity. Sip on Herbal tea and savor Dark chocolate.
topic_description: Reduce stress, improve focus, and cultivate a sense of inner peace.

title: Bootcamp Challenge
description: Experience the ultimate challenge in our Bootcamp Challenge. Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays from 6:15 AM to 7:15 AM. A mix of strength, cardio, and agility exercises to burn calories and build strength. Power up with Egg whites and Whole grain toast.
topic_description: Burn calories, build strength, and improve overall fitness levels.

title: Cycling Fusion
description: Revitalize your cardiovascular health with Cycling Fusion. Tuesdays and Thursdays from 7:30 AM to 8:15 AM. Combine cycling with strength exercises. Refresh with a Smoothie with protein powder and a Banana.
topic_description: Improve cardiovascular health and leg strength with an energizing ride.

title: Functional Fitness
description: Enhance daily activities and prevent injuries with Functional Fitness. Saturdays and Sundays from 10:30 AM to 11:20 AM. Focus on flexibility, balance, and strength. Refuel with Turkey slices and Trail mix.
topic_description: Improve flexibility, balance, and strength for everyday tasks.

title: Senior Wellness
description: Promote mobility, flexibility, and overall well-being with Senior Wellness. Tuesdays and Thursdays from 11:00 AM to 11:40 AM. Gentle exercises for joint health. Enjoy Oatmeal and Low-fat milk.
topic_description: Maintain joint health and stay active in a supportive environment.

title: Kickboxing Cardio
description: Unleash your power in Kickboxing Cardio. Wednesdays and Fridays from 6:30 PM to 7:25 PM. A dynamic cardio workout to burn calories, improve coordination, and boost cardiovascular fitness. Reenergize with a Protein smoothie and an Apple.
topic_description: Burn calories, improve coordination, and boost cardiovascular fitness.

title: Barre Sculpt
description: Sculpt and tone your body with Barre Sculpt. Mondays and Thursdays from 8:00 AM to 8:50 AM. A fusion of ballet-inspired and strength exercises for muscle endurance, flexibility, and overall body toning. Recharge with a Salad with lean protein and Chia pudding.
topic_description: Focus on muscle endurance, flexibility, and overall body toning.

title: TRX Suspension
description: Engage your core and enhance functional strength with TRX Suspension. Saturdays and Sundays from 4:00 PM to 4:45 PM. Utilize suspension training for a full-body workout. Replenish with Veggies with hummus and Trail mix.
topic_description: Engage core muscles and enhance overall functional strength.
